previous_statement: CONCLUSION: Combining nodes 1.1, 1.2, and 1.3: For G with A_n ≤ G ≤ S_n, we have G = A_n iff all generators are even, and G = S_n iff G contains an odd permutation. QED.
new_statement: CONCLUSION: Combining nodes 1.2, 1.3, and 1.4: For G with A_n <= G <= S_n, we have G = A_n iff all generators are even (node 1.3), and G = S_n iff G contains an odd permutation (node 1.4). The dichotomy follows from the index-2 property (node 1.2). QED.
